text: TRITON海神除毛雷射是一種先進的多波長除毛技術，結合了亞歷山大755nm雷射與二極體810nm雷射的優勢，能有效去除各種毛髮和適應不同膚色。這項技術能在更少的治療次數內提供更顯著的除毛效果，適合各種膚色和毛髮類型的顧客
description_auto: 利用多波長雷射技術，結合亞歷山大755nm雷射和二極體810nm雷射，深入毛囊根部，從根本上解決毛髮問題。透過3P散熱冷卻技術，有效降低疼痛感，並且減少治療後的熱脹和紅腫。

description_en: PicoWay ultra-picosecond laser is an advanced skin treatment technology that uses ultra-short pulses and high-energy light beams to effectively solve a variety of skin problems, such as scars, wrinkles, tattoos, freckles and pigmentation spots. It is wound-free and repairs quickly. No anesthesia is required for treatment, with slight stinging and a short recovery period. It is suitable for the treatment of comprehensive skin problems, with a strong photoshock effect and significant results.

text: 多數人施作1-2次三倍光療程，就可改善紅斑、棕斑、血管病變、膚色不均、毛孔粗大等肌膚問題經醫師評估後連續施作4-6次，可達到更明顯的效果。每次建議間隔3-4週，不過仍需和專業醫師進行諮詢，依據皮膚狀況不同，治療次數也會不同。

description: 三倍光 LUMECCA 是一種高效能的脈衝光治療，需治療血管病變、縮小毛孔、減少細紋、酒糟肌、敏感肌適用，其非侵入性光療可依據皮膚問題調整能量，達到美白和修復效果，適合多種皮膚問題的治療。
description_en: Triple Light LUMECCA is a high-efficiency pulsed light treatment that is suitable for treating vascular lesions, shrinking pores, reducing fine lines, rosacea, and sensitive skin. Its non-invasive light therapy can adjust the energy according to skin problems to achieve whitening and repair effects, and is suitable for the treatment of a variety of skin problems.
compare_notes: 三倍光 LUMECCA 是一種 雷射光療 技術，與其他療程相比，其主要特點在於效果、適應症或施作方式的差異。
compare_notes_en: Triple Light LUMECCA is a laser light therapy technique whose main speciality is the difference in effect, adaptation, or way of doing it, as compared to other treatments.

text: 當治療到滿意效果時，建議每3個月施作一次LUMECCA三倍光療程，避免臉部出現紅斑、棕斑、毛孔粗大等問題，透過定期保養肌膚，來減緩老化現象。

text: ULTRAFORMER MPT 海芙音波媚必提是知名的聚焦式超音波拉提技術的全新旗艦機種。與傳統的第三代音波相比，媚必提版本新增以下特色：
description_auto: 想改善臉部鬆弛、拉提輪廓卻又不想動刀？海芙音波媚必提（Ultraformer MPT）是目前最新一代的海芙音波療程，不僅大幅提升治療效率與舒適度，更導入創新的 MPT 微脈衝技術，為愛美人士提供非侵入式、無修復期的高階拉提新選擇。
name: 海芙音波媚必提
description: 海芙音波媚必提的治療原理：●熱能聚焦 → 深層緊實● 促進膠原蛋白增生 → 撫平細紋、改善鬆垮● 拉提肌膚輪廓 → 改善臉型、下垂問題，無論是眼周、輪廓線、雙下巴或身體局部鬆弛部位，皆能進行精緻的緊實拉提治療理。非侵入性無需恢復期，療程結束後即可正常上妝、外出，實現高效又舒適的療效。
description_en: The treatment principle of Haifu Sound Wave Meibi Lifting: ● Focusing heat energy → Deep tightening ● Promoting collagen proliferation → Smoothing fine lines and improving sagging ● Lifting skin contours → Improving face shape and sagging problems, whether it is the area around the eyes, contour lines, double chins or sagging parts of the body, they can all be subjected to exquisite firming and lifting treatments. It is non-invasive and does not require a recovery period. You can put on makeup and go out normally after the treatment, achieving efficient and comfortable results.
compare_notes: 海芙音波媚必提 是一種 緊緻拉提 技術，與其他療程相比，其主要特點在於效果、適應症或施作方式的差異。
compare_notes_en: Heifer Pomerite is a tight Latti technique whose main speciality is the difference in effect, adaptation, or way of doing it, as compared to other treatments.

text: ● MPT 微脈衝技術：將每發能量細分為 417 個聚焦點，治療更均勻、效果更精準。● 連續聚焦模式：能量輸出更連貫，適合快速處理大範圍肌膚鬆弛。● 圓周探頭設計：靈活貼合臉部曲線，專治鼻翼、眼周等精細部位。

description_en: The treatment principle of Haifu Sound Wave Meibi Lifting: ● Focusing heat energy → Deep tightening ● Promoting collagen proliferation → Smoothing fine lines and improving sagging ● Lifting skin contours → Improving face shape and sagging problems, whether it is the area around the eyes, contour lines, double chins or sagging parts of the body, they can all be subjected to exquisite firming and lifting treatments. It is non-invasive and does not require a recovery period. You can put on makeup and go out normally after the treatment, achieving efficient and comfortable results.
compare_notes: 海芙音波媚必提 是一種 緊緻拉提 技術，與其他療程相比，其主要特點在於效果、適應症或施作方式的差異。
compare_notes_en: Heifer Pomerite is a tight Latti technique whose main speciality is the difference in effect, adaptation, or way of doing it, as compared to other treatments.

text: 新增的MPT微脈衝技術能夠將每發能量細分至417個精準聚焦的微小熱凝結點，提供更高效且精準的治療效果。
description_auto: 想改善臉部鬆弛、拉提輪廓卻又不想動刀？海芙音波媚必提（Ultraformer MPT）是目前最新一代的海芙音波療程，不僅大幅提升治療效率與舒適度，更導入創新的 MPT 微脈衝技術，為愛美人士提供非侵入式、無修復期的高階拉提新選擇。

description: 海芙音波媚必提的治療原理：●熱能聚焦 → 深層緊實● 促進膠原蛋白增生 → 撫平細紋、改善鬆垮● 拉提肌膚輪廓 → 改善臉型、下垂問題，無論是眼周、輪廓線、雙下巴或身體局部鬆弛部位，皆能進行精緻的緊實拉提治療理。非侵入性無需恢復期，療程結束後即可正常上妝、外出，實現高效又舒適的療效。
description_en: The treatment principle of Haifu Sound Wave Meibi Lifting: ● Focusing heat energy → Deep tightening ● Promoting collagen proliferation → Smoothing fine lines and improving sagging ● Lifting skin contours → Improving face shape and sagging problems, whether it is the area around the eyes, contour lines, double chins or sagging parts of the body, they can all be subjected to exquisite firming and lifting treatments. It is non-invasive and does not require a recovery period. You can put on makeup and go out normally after the treatment, achieving efficient and comfortable results.
compare_notes: 海芙音波媚必提 是一種 緊緻拉提 技術，與其他療程相比，其主要特點在於效果、適應症或施作方式的差異。
compare_notes_en: Heifer Pomerite is a tight Latti technique whose main speciality is the difference in effect, adaptation, or way of doing it, as compared to other treatments.

text: 鳳凰電波Thermage FLX是一種經美國FDA認證的非侵入性療程，專為緊緻肌膚和抗老化設計
description_auto: 鳳凰電波是一種經美國FDA認證的非侵入性療程，專為緊緻肌膚和抗老化設計。安全有保障，治療後可立即恢復日常活動。可刺激自體膠原蛋白再生，達到持久的緊緻效果。
name: 鳳凰電波Thermage FLX
description: 鳳凰電波Thermage FLX是專為緊緻肌膚和抗老化設計，促進膠原蛋白增生，使皮膚在未來一到兩年內保持年輕、緊緻的狀態。研究顯示，不僅能緊緻肌膚，還能減少脂肪層體積，達到小臉效果。在身體部位使用時，能改善橘皮和凹凸不平的紋路，使肌膚恢復彈性。非侵入性無需恢復期，療程結束後即可正常上妝、外出。
description_en: Phoenix Thermage FLX is specially designed for skin firming and anti-aging, promoting collagen proliferation to keep the skin young and firm in the next one to two years. Studies have shown that it can not only tighten the skin, but also reduce the volume of the fat layer to achieve a smaller face effect. When used on the body, it can improve cellulite and uneven texture and restore skin's elasticity. It is non-invasive and does not require a recovery period. You can put on makeup and go out normally after the treatment.
compare_notes: 鳳凰電波Thermage FLX 是一種 緊緻拉提 技術，與其他療程相比，其主要特點在於效果、適應症或施作方式的差異。
compare_notes_en: Hermage FLX is a tight lattig technique whose main feature is the difference in effect, adaptation or mode of application compared to other treatments.

text: 鳳凰電波採用專利無線電波技術，通過立體式容積加熱原理，從表皮到深層肌膚進行全面加熱。當射頻能量加熱皮膚時，溫度逐漸上升，膠原蛋白的結構發生變化，讓膠原蛋白收縮並刺激新的膠原蛋白生成。不僅能即時緊緻肌膚，還會持續促進膠原蛋白增生，使皮膚在未來一到兩年內保持年輕、緊緻的狀態。

description_auto: 鳳凰電波是一種經美國FDA認證的非侵入性療程，專為緊緻肌膚和抗老化設計。安全有保障，治療後可立即恢復日常活動。可刺激自體膠原蛋白再生，達到持久的緊緻效果。
name: 鳳凰電波Thermage FLX
description: 鳳凰電波Thermage FLX是專為緊緻肌膚和抗老化設計，促進膠原蛋白增生，使皮膚在未來一到兩年內保持年輕、緊緻的狀態。研究顯示，不僅能緊緻肌膚，還能減少脂肪層體積，達到小臉效果。在身體部位使用時，能改善橘皮和凹凸不平的紋路，使肌膚恢復彈性。非侵入性無需恢復期，療程結束後即可正常上妝、外出。
description_en: Phoenix Thermage FLX is specially designed for skin firming and anti-aging, promoting collagen proliferation to keep the skin young and firm in the next one to two years. Studies have shown that it can not only tighten the skin, but also reduce the volume of the fat layer to achieve a smaller face effect. When used on the body, it can improve cellulite and uneven texture and restore skin's elasticity. It is non-invasive and does not require a recovery period. You can put on makeup and go out normally after the treatment.

description_auto: 鳳凰電波是一種經美國FDA認證的非侵入性療程，專為緊緻肌膚和抗老化設計。安全有保障，治療後可立即恢復日常活動。可刺激自體膠原蛋白再生，達到持久的緊緻效果。
name: 鳳凰電波Thermage FLX
description: 鳳凰電波Thermage FLX是專為緊緻肌膚和抗老化設計，促進膠原蛋白增生，使皮膚在未來一到兩年內保持年輕、緊緻的狀態。研究顯示，不僅能緊緻肌膚，還能減少脂肪層體積，達到小臉效果。在身體部位使用時，能改善橘皮和凹凸不平的紋路，使肌膚恢復彈性。非侵入性無需恢復期，療程結束後即可正常上妝、外出。
description_en: Phoenix Thermage FLX is specially designed for skin firming and anti-aging, promoting collagen proliferation to keep the skin young and firm in the next one to two years. Studies have shown that it can not only tighten the skin, but also reduce the volume of the fat layer to achieve a smaller face effect. When used on the body, it can improve cellulite and uneven texture and restore skin's elasticity. It is non-invasive and does not require a recovery period. You can put on makeup and go out normally after the treatment.

text: 海菲秀（Hydrafacial）是一款先進的皮膚管理系統，專為改善肌膚健康而設計。與傳統的皮膚護理系統不同，現在已發展成一個強大的皮膚管理平台，提供快速、有效且舒適的護理體驗。通過30分鐘的療程，結合超過60種專利認證技術，海菲秀已成為全球90多個國家美容護理的首選。
description_auto: 海菲秀利用專利的HydroPeel®技術，搭配美國原瓶原裝進口的精華液，進行深層清潔、保濕和防護，能有效去除老廢角質、清潔毛孔、提供深層保濕，並注入抗氧化和修護成分，達到全面的皮膚管理效果。
name: 海菲秀 Hydrafacial
description: 海菲秀 (Hydrafacial) 能有效去除老廢角質、清潔毛孔、提供深層保濕，搭配美國原瓶原裝進口的精華液並注入抗氧化和修護成分，達到全面的皮膚管理效果。海菲秀護膚三步驟:1.藍色探頭：清潔+去角質探頭 2.綠色探頭：吸取粉刺+保濕探頭 3.白色探頭：注入+防護探頭
description_en: Hydrafacial, using a specialized HydroPeel technique, specially designed rotor tablets and specialized spin-in techniques that effectively remove old waste horns, clean hair holes, provide deep wetting, match the fine fluids of the original US bottle entry and inject antioxidation and maintenance components to the full skin management effect. Haif shows three-step skin management.
compare_notes: 海菲秀 Hydrafacial 是一種 皮膚管理 技術，與其他療程相比，其主要特點在於效果、適應症或施作方式的差異。
compare_notes_en: Heifey Hydrafacial is a skin management technique whose main feature is the difference between the effects, the adaptations, or the manner in which they are performed, as compared to other treatments.

text: 無針水光 SEYO 是一種非侵入式的保養療程，透過德國原裝 SEYO 水光儀，將精華液高壓導入肌膚底層，一次療程效果媲美敷了 100 片面膜。SEYO 採用專利 TDA 噴射技術，將分子細化成霧狀，深入滲透至肌膚深層，達到深層保濕、亮白、抗老與修復的功效。
description_auto: 無針水光 SEYO 是德國原裝非侵入式肌膚護理技術，結合專利TDA噴射導入，快速滲透玻尿酸與精華，改善乾燥、敏感、暗沉等肌膚問題，無痛零恢復期。
name: 無針水光 SEYO
description: 無針水光 SEYO 以溫和、快速又精準的導入方式，讓每一次療程都成為全方位的肌膚修復與亮膚體驗。非侵入式技術:利用TDA德國原廠專利精華液專利透皮技術，高度保濕：富含玻尿酸與保濕成分，改善肌膚代謝、抗痘抗敏：含有天然蜂膠調理肌膚，深入滋潤肌膚、美白亮肌：改善肌膚色素代謝和暗黃、深層抗皺：淡化細紋、緊緻肌膚，將LP3精華高效輸送至肌膚深層，短短12分鐘即可感受到肌膚的明顯變化，持久保濕、修復及亮白效果，煥發青春光彩。
description_en: The needle-free SEYO water light is introduced in a gentle, fast and precise way, making each treatment a comprehensive skin repair and brightening experience. Non-invasive technology: Utilizes TDA German original patented essence patented transdermal technology, highly moisturizing: rich in hyaluronic acid and moisturizing ingredients, improves skin metabolism, anti-acne and anti-allergy: contains natural propolis to regulate the skin, deeply moisturizes the skin, whitens and brightens the skin: improves skin pigment metabolism and dullness, deep anti-wrinkle: fades fine lines, tightens the skin, and efficiently delivers LP3 essence to the deep layers of the skin. You can feel the obvious changes in the skin in just 12 minutes, with lasting moisturizing, repairing and brightening effects, and a youthful glow.

text: 這款療程完全無針、無痛、無修復期，不僅適用於臉部，還能針對頭皮、指甲與私密處進行溫和護理，是敏感肌或怕痛族群的理想選擇。與傳統水光針不同，無針水光 SEYO屬於非醫療等級的美容科技，讓保養更輕鬆、安全、無負擔。
description_auto: 無針水光 SEYO 是德國原裝非侵入式肌膚護理技術，結合專利TDA噴射導入，快速滲透玻尿酸與精華，改善乾燥、敏感、暗沉等肌膚問題，無痛零恢復期。
name: 無針水光 SEYO
description: 無針水光 SEYO 以溫和、快速又精準的導入方式，讓每一次療程都成為全方位的肌膚修復與亮膚體驗。非侵入式技術:利用TDA德國原廠專利精華液專利透皮技術，高度保濕：富含玻尿酸與保濕成分，改善肌膚代謝、抗痘抗敏：含有天然蜂膠調理肌膚，深入滋潤肌膚、美白亮肌：改善肌膚色素代謝和暗黃、深層抗皺：淡化細紋、緊緻肌膚，將LP3精華高效輸送至肌膚深層，短短12分鐘即可感受到肌膚的明顯變化，持久保濕、修復及亮白效果，煥發青春光彩。

text: 無針水光 SEYO透過德國研發的 TDA（無針透皮技術），將專利 LP3 精華液霧化成超微分子，以高頻噴射方式均勻導入至肌膚表層與深層。整個過程無針無痛，卻能精準滲透，不僅保濕力強，更可從根源活化肌膚細胞。

text: 美國經典肉毒
description_auto: BOTOX® 是首個通過美國食品藥品管理局 (FDA) 核准的肉毒桿菌素品牌，由美國研發製造。自1990年代起，BOTOX® 被發現能有效改善皮膚皺紋，迅速引起全球關注。
name: 保妥適 BOTOXR
description: BotoxR 由國際知名醫藥公司愛力根 (Allergan) 推出，是全球首個上市的肉毒桿菌素。自通過FDA認證至今已超過30年，銷量超過1億瓶。透過阻斷神經與肌肉之間的訊號傳遞，達到放鬆肌肉和除皺的效果。還可用於瘦臉、瘦腿和瘦肩等美容目的。注射後需約一周效果逐漸增強，較大肌肉群（如小腿、肩膀）則需約一個月達到完整效果。醫美適應症：上臉、★皺眉紋、★魚尾紋、★抬頭紋
description_en: BotoxR was launched by Allergan, an internationally renowned pharmaceutical company, and is the world’s first botulinum toxin to be marketed. It has been more than 30 years since it passed FDA certification, with sales exceeding 100 million bottles. By blocking the signal transmission between nerves and muscles, it achieves the effect of relaxing muscles and removing wrinkles. It can also be used for cosmetic purposes such as slimming the face, legs and shoulders. It takes about a week for the effects to build after injection, and about a month for larger muscle groups (such as calves and shoulders) to achieve full effects. Medical beauty indications: upper face, ★ frown lines, ★ crow's feet, ★ forehead wrinkles
compare_notes: 保妥適 BOTOXR 是一種 肉毒 技術，與其他療程相比，其主要特點在於效果、適應症或施作方式的差異。
compare_notes_en: Precise BOTOX is a meat-toxic technique whose main speciality is the difference in effect, adaptation, or way of doing it, as compared to other treatments.

text: Botox® 由國際知名醫藥公司愛力根 (Allergan) 推出，是全球首個上市的肉毒桿菌素。自通過FDA認證至今已超過30年，臨床研究豐富，並獲得全球上百個國家的市場認可，銷量超過1億瓶。Botox® 以其卓越的效果和安全性，成為除皺和美容的代名詞，經受住了時間的考驗。

text: 價格與效果確實有關聯。若接受的注射價格過低且效果持續時間短，則有可能施術醫師所用的藥品和劑量存在問題。建議客戶不要為了幾千塊的價差而妥協自己的安全，選擇正規醫療機構和經驗豐富的醫師更為重要。
description_auto: BOTOX® 是首個通過美國食品藥品管理局 (FDA) 核准的肉毒桿菌素品牌，由美國研發製造。自1990年代起，BOTOX® 被發現能有效改善皮膚皺紋，迅速引起全球關注。
name: 保妥適 BOTOXR
description: BotoxR 由國際知名醫藥公司愛力根 (Allergan) 推出，是全球首個上市的肉毒桿菌素。自通過FDA認證至今已超過30年，銷量超過1億瓶。透過阻斷神經與肌肉之間的訊號傳遞，達到放鬆肌肉和除皺的效果。還可用於瘦臉、瘦腿和瘦肩等美容目的。注射後需約一周效果逐漸增強，較大肌肉群（如小腿、肩膀）則需約一個月達到完整效果。醫美適應症：上臉、★皺眉紋、★魚尾紋、★抬頭紋
description_en: BotoxR was launched by Allergan, an internationally renowned pharmaceutical company, and is the world’s first botulinum toxin to be marketed. It has been more than 30 years since it passed FDA certification, with sales exceeding 100 million bottles. By blocking the signal transmission between nerves and muscles, it achieves the effect of relaxing muscles and removing wrinkles. It can also be used for cosmetic purposes such as slimming the face, legs and shoulders. It takes about a week for the effects to build after injection, and about a month for larger muscle groups (such as calves and shoulders) to achieve full effects. Medical beauty indications: upper face, ★ frown lines, ★ crow's feet, ★ forehead wrinkles
compare_notes: 保妥適 BOTOXR 是一種 肉毒 技術，與其他療程相比，其主要特點在於效果、適應症或施作方式的差異。
compare_notes_en: Precise BOTOX is a meat-toxic technique whose main speciality is the difference in effect, adaptation, or way of doing it, as compared to other treatments.

text: 所需劑量取決於想改善的部位及程度。一般而言，一個部位的表情紋需要約8-16單位（U），瘦小臉及下顎線拉提需要約30-60U，瘦小腿則需要約160-200U，多汗症一個部位需要約50-100U。具體劑量應由醫師看診並與醫師討論後確定。

text: 24小時內見效，比其他品牌更快。除了除皺，還能瘦小臉、縮鼻翼、改善露牙齦、放鬆下巴肌肉、腋下止汗等
description_auto: 皇家肉毒是A型肉毒桿菌素，上市超過30年，全球有超過70個國家使用。這款產品擁有最多的活性肉毒桿菌素，提供快速且持久的效果。每次療程最快24小時有感
name: 皇家肉毒
description: 皇家肉毒是A型肉毒桿菌素，上市超過30年，全球有超過70個國家使用，從而放鬆肌肉，達到消除動態紋路的效果。24小時內見效，比其他品牌更快。除了除皺，還能瘦小臉、縮鼻翼、改善露牙齦、放鬆下巴肌肉、腋下止汗等，效果可以維持5-6個月，某些情況下可達8-12個月。擁有最多的活性肉毒桿菌素，效果顯著
description_en: Royal Botox is a botulinum toxin type A that has been on the market for more than 30 years and is used in more than 70 countries around the world to relax muscles and eliminate dynamic lines. Effective within 24 hours, faster than other brands. In addition to removing wrinkles, it can also make the face slimmer, shrink the nose, improve gum exposure, relax jaw muscles, and stop sweating under the armpits. The effect can last for 5-6 months, and in some cases up to 8-12 months. Contains the most active botulinum toxin, with significant effects
compare_notes: 皇家肉毒 是一種 肉毒 技術，與其他療程相比，其主要特點在於效果、適應症或施作方式的差異。
compare_notes_en: Royal botany is a form of meat poison technique, whose main feature is the difference in effect, adaptation or the way in which it is performed, as compared to other treatments.

text: Neuronox® 具有高純度，在使用過程中可以提供穩定且預測性高的療效。
description_auto: Neuronox® 是韓國第一個研究上市的肉毒桿菌產品，已上市超過15年，並在全球取得近40個國家核可，在全球已有超過60個國家上市使用（截至2021年9月）。自2006年起，全球銷售超過2000萬瓶，擁有與Botox®等效的療效與安全性。
name: 奇肌肉毒 NeuronoxR
description: NeuronoxR 是韓國第一個研究上市的肉毒桿菌產品。擁有與BotoxR等效的療效與安全性。使用的是C型肉毒桿菌毒素A型。三大優勢:高純度、韓國首席、高效力高安全性，適應位置:顱面多汗症、皺鼻紋、鼻頭提高、唇週紋、魚尾紋、鼻翼修飾、縮小咬肌、下巴肌肉不平整、擴頸肌、前胸紋路、腋下多汗等
description_en: NeuronoxR is the first research-based botulinum toxin product to be marketed in Korea. It has the same efficacy and safety as BotoxR. Botulinum toxin type A and type C are used. Three major advantages: high purity, Korea's leading, high efficacy and high safety, suitable for: craniofacial hyperhidrosis, wrinkled nose lines, nose tip enhancement, lip wrinkles, crow's feet, nose wing modification, masseter muscle reduction, uneven jaw muscles, neck expansion muscles, chest lines, underarm hyperhidrosis, etc.
compare_notes: 奇肌肉毒 NeuronoxR  是一種 肉毒 技術，與其他療程相比，其主要特點在於效果、適應症或施作方式的差異。
compare_notes_en: Neuronox is a form of meat poison technique, whose main feature is the difference in effect, adaptation, or way of doing it, as compared to other treatments.

text: 韓國首個研究上市的肉毒桿菌產品，擁有最多的研究數據，在韓國的銷售量和銷售時間均排名第一，並在KALDAT學會的大規模調查中獲得醫師認可為最佳肉毒桿菌素產品。

text: 治療後1~2天左右，可能會開始感覺到注射部位有些痠軟，代表效果已經開始作用。之後隨著時間推移，至注射約2~4週後可達最大效果。建議治療後大約兩週後回診，讓醫師檢視治療效果，並討論是否需要微調等。

text: 肉毒桿菌素是會隨著時間而逐漸失去效力的，肌肉也會漸漸恢復運動能力。因此停止注射後，皺紋會因為肌肉動作恢復而回復為原來的樣子，並不會變得更加嚴重。

description: NeuronoxR 是韓國第一個研究上市的肉毒桿菌產品。擁有與BotoxR等效的療效與安全性。使用的是C型肉毒桿菌毒素A型。三大優勢:高純度、韓國首席、高效力高安全性，適應位置:顱面多汗症、皺鼻紋、鼻頭提高、唇週紋、魚尾紋、鼻翼修飾、縮小咬肌、下巴肌肉不平整、擴頸肌、前胸紋路、腋下多汗等
description_en: NeuronoxR is the first research-based botulinum toxin product to be marketed in Korea. It has the same efficacy and safety as BotoxR. Botulinum toxin type A and type C are used. Three major advantages: high purity, Korea's leading, high efficacy and high safety, suitable for: craniofacial hyperhidrosis, wrinkled nose lines, nose tip enhancement, lip wrinkles, crow's feet, nose wing modification, masseter muscle reduction, uneven jaw muscles, neck expansion muscles, chest lines, underarm hyperhidrosis, etc.
compare_notes: 奇肌肉毒 NeuronoxR  是一種 肉毒 技術，與其他療程相比，其主要特點在於效果、適應症或施作方式的差異。
compare_notes_en: Neuronox is a form of meat poison technique, whose main feature is the difference in effect, adaptation, or way of doing it, as compared to other treatments.

text: 療程前後：術後三週
description_auto: Neuramis 仙女玻尿酸是由韓國知名醫美技術大廠生產的高品質透明質酸填充劑。適用於矯正中臉部的凹陷，注射位置為骨膜上方或皮下。該產品經過嚴格的 FDA、CE 和 KFDA 認證，確保其安全性和有效性。
name: 仙女玻尿酸 Neuramis
description: 仙女玻尿酸（Neuramis）是由韓國知名醫美技術大廠生產由孫藝珍指定代言。玻尿酸能夠吸收大量水分，提供極佳的保濕效果，同時通過填充凹陷部位來改善面部輪廓，達到緊緻和提升的效果，適用於矯正中臉部的凹陷，注射位置為骨膜上方或皮下。效果通常可以持續6到12個月。
description_en: Neuramis is produced by a well-known Korean medical beauty technology company and is endorsed by Son Ye-jin. Hyaluronic acid can absorb a large amount of water and provide excellent moisturizing effect. At the same time, it improves the facial contour by filling the sunken areas to achieve the effect of firming and lifting. It is suitable for correcting the depression in the middle face. The injection position is above the periosteum or subcutaneous. The effects usually last 6 to 12 months.
compare_notes: 仙女玻尿酸 Neuramis 是一種 玻尿酸 技術，與其他療程相比，其主要特點在於效果、適應症或施作方式的差異。
compare_notes_en: Fairy Neuramis is a bouretic technique whose main feature is the difference in effect, adaptation or mode of application compared to other treatments.

At the same time, it improves the facial contour by filling the sunken areas to achieve the effect of firming and lifting. It is suitable for correcting the depression in the middle face. The injection position is above the periosteum or subcutaneous. The effects usually last 6 to 12 months.
compare_notes: 仙女玻尿酸 Neuramis 是一種 玻尿酸 技術，與其他療程相比，其主要特點在於效果、適應症或施作方式的差異。
compare_notes_en: Fairy Neuramis is a bouretic technique whose main feature is the difference in effect, adaptation or mode of application compared to other treatments.

text: 瑞絲朗玻尿酸系列包括常見的OBT女神【動態】玻尿酸和NASHA【純粹】系列
description_auto: 瑞斯朗來自瑞典，採用了專利的「動態平衡優化技術」（Optimal Balance Technology, OBT），賦予玻尿酸卓越的拉伸力（Flexibility）。這種技術使玻尿酸在面部表情運動時能夠自然拉伸，避免位移和變形，確保效果自然持久。
name: 瑞絲朗玻尿酸
description: 瑞絲朗是來自瑞典的頂級玻尿酸品牌，常見的OBT女神【動態】玻尿酸 和 NASHA【純粹】系列，OBT玻尿酸注射後，隨著面部表情的變化自然擺動，效果持久且自然。採用微導親膚科技，使玻尿酸分子與肌膚組織緊密貼合，效果自然宛若天生。OBT玻尿酸的效果可維持12至18個月，注射後效果立即可見術後滿意度高，耐受性良好。首個獲得美國FDA認證的玻尿酸品牌。能夠自然塑形，提升面部輪廓。
description_en: Riselong is a top hyaluronic acid brand from Sweden. Its common products include OBT Goddess [Dynamic] Hyaluronic Acid and NASHA [Pure] series. After OBT hyaluronic acid injection, it swings naturally with the changes in facial expressions, and the effect is long-lasting and natural. Using micro-guided skin-friendly technology, the hyaluronic acid molecules can fit closely with the skin tissue, and the effect is as natural as if it was born. The effect of OBT hyaluronic acid can last for 12 to 18 months. The effect is immediately visible after injection, and the postoperative satisfaction is high and the tolerance is good. The first hyaluronic acid brand to obtain US FDA certification. It can naturally shape and enhance facial contours.
compare_notes: 瑞絲朗玻尿酸 是一種 玻尿酸 技術，與其他療程相比，其主要特點在於效果、適應症或施作方式的差異。
compare_notes_en: Rathlan urephalic acid is a bouria technique whose main feature is the difference between the effects, the adaptations, or the manner of the application, as compared to other treatments.

text: 來自瑞典的頂級玻尿酸品牌，已陪伴愛美人士超過20年。承襲北歐設計精神，瑞絲朗以全球玻尿酸領導品牌的姿態誕生，成為首個獲得美國FDA認證的玻尿酸品牌。

Using micro-guided skin-friendly technology, the hyaluronic acid molecules can fit closely with the skin tissue, and the effect is as natural as if it was born. The effect of OBT hyaluronic acid can last for 12 to 18 months. The effect is immediately visible after injection, and the postoperative satisfaction is high and the tolerance is good. The first hyaluronic acid brand to obtain US FDA certification. It can naturally shape and enhance facial contours.

text: 注射後即時見效，皺紋和細紋立即改善，隨著時間推移，膠原蛋白逐步增生，效果更加明顯。
description_auto: 喬雅登玻尿酸（Juvéderm®）是一款由美國藥廠愛力根（Allergan）代理的先進膚質改善產品，採用VYCROSS®專利交聯技術，確保玻尿酸的長效性和穩定性。其主要成分為天然醣類聚合物，經過多項國際認證，安全可靠，能夠深層保濕，改善膚質。
name: 喬雅登玻尿酸 JuvedermR
description: 喬雅登玻尿酸（JuvedermR）是一款由美國藥廠愛力根（Allergan）代理的先進膚質改善產品，能夠深層保濕，改善膚質，臨床上具有低敏特性。即時填補：注射後立即見效，填補面部凹陷和皺紋。長效刺激：持續刺激膠原蛋白增生，效果持續數年。Hylacross專利鍊結技術延長了玻尿酸在人體內的代謝時間，效果可持續6-18個月。
description_en: JuvedermR is an advanced skin improvement product distributed by the American pharmaceutical company Allergan. It can deeply moisturize, improve skin texture, and has clinically proven hypoallergenic properties. Instant filling: The effect is immediate after injection, filling facial depressions and wrinkles. Long-lasting stimulation: Continuously stimulate collagen proliferation, the effect lasts for several years. Hylacross patented linking technology prolongs the metabolism time of hyaluronic acid in the human body, and the effect can last for 6-18 months.
compare_notes: 喬雅登玻尿酸 JuvedermR 是一種 玻尿酸 技術，與其他療程相比，其主要特點在於效果、適應症或施作方式的差異。
compare_notes_en: Joaden puretic acid Juvederm is a bouria technique whose main feature is the difference between the effects, the adaptations, or the way the treatment is performed, as compared to other treatments.

text: 夫妻宮：術後當下
description_auto: 舒顏萃玻尿酸（4D Sculptra，亦稱4D 童妍針）是一種先進的皮膚填充劑，專為改善面部皺紋和細紋設計，能夠深層刺激膠原蛋白的增生，達到長效的肌膚緊緻與提升效
name: 舒顏萃 Sculptra
description: 舒顏萃 4D Sculptra聚左旋乳酸（又稱4D童妍針）主要成分是聚左旋乳酸注入皮膚後，該成分會逐步被身體吸收並分解，釋放出刺激膠原蛋白增生的訊號，與傳統填充劑不同，舒顏萃玻尿酸不僅提供即時效果，還能持續提升膠原蛋白的生成，使效果更加持久和自然。注射後4-6週效果最明顯，效果持續2年，且生物相容性高。
description_en: The main ingredient of 4D Sculptra poly-L-lactic acid (also known as 4D Tongyan needle) is poly-L-lactic acid. After being injected into the skin, the ingredient will be gradually absorbed and decomposed by the body, releasing signals that stimulate collagen proliferation. Unlike traditional fillers, Shuyancui hyaluronic acid not only provides instant results, but also can continuously enhance collagen production, making the effect more lasting and natural. The effect is most obvious 4-6 weeks after injection, lasts for 2 years, and has high biocompatibility.
compare_notes: 舒顏萃 Sculptra 是一種 膠原蛋白增生 技術，與其他療程相比，其主要特點在於效果、適應症或施作方式的差異。
compare_notes_en: Comfortable Sculptra is a plyon protein growth technique whose main feature is the difference in effect, adaptation or mode of application as compared to other treatments.

text: Ellanse洢蓮絲和玻尿酸（Hyaluronic Acid）皆為填充劑的一種，但在成分、功效和適用部位上有所不同。洢蓮絲是膠原蛋白促生劑，能填補凹陷並長效刺激膠原蛋白生長，維持時間較長。玻尿酸是透明質酸，根據不同部位選用不同分子大小的劑型，支撐力較弱，維持效果約半年至一年半。
description_auto: Ellanse洢蓮絲，又稱「少女針」，主要由70%的CMC凝膠和30%的PCL微型晶球組成能被人體吸收的醫療級聚合物，可誘發自體膠原蛋白新生。
name: 洢蓮絲 Ellanse
description: Ellanse洢蓮絲（又稱少女針）主要由70%的CMC凝膠和30%的PCL微型晶球組成。這些成分都是能被人體完全吸收的醫療級聚合物，可誘發自體膠原蛋白新生。經由STAT技術，分為S、M兩種劑型，效果分別可維持1、2年。適合大範圍臉部填充及拉提塑型。所有劑型均含有麻醉成分，以降低注射時的不適感。
description_en: Ellanse (also known as the girl needle) is mainly composed of 70% CMC gel and 30% PCL micro crystal balls. These ingredients are medical-grade polymers that can be fully absorbed by the human body and can induce the regeneration of autologous collagen. Through STAT technology, it is divided into two dosage forms, S and M, and the effects can last for 1 and 2 years respectively. Suitable for large-area facial filling and lifting and shaping. All formulations contain an anesthetic to reduce discomfort during injection.
compare_notes: 洢蓮絲 Ellanse 是一種 膠原蛋白增生 技術，與其他療程相比，其主要特點在於效果、適應症或施作方式的差異。

description_auto: Ellanse洢蓮絲，又稱「少女針」，主要由70%的CMC凝膠和30%的PCL微型晶球組成能被人體吸收的醫療級聚合物，可誘發自體膠原蛋白新生。
name: 洢蓮絲 Ellanse
description: Ellanse洢蓮絲（又稱少女針）主要由70%的CMC凝膠和30%的PCL微型晶球組成。這些成分都是能被人體完全吸收的醫療級聚合物，可誘發自體膠原蛋白新生。經由STAT技術，分為S、M兩種劑型，效果分別可維持1、2年。適合大範圍臉部填充及拉提塑型。所有劑型均含有麻醉成分，以降低注射時的不適感。
description_en: Ellanse (also known as the girl needle) is mainly composed of 70% CMC gel and 30% PCL micro crystal balls. These ingredients are medical-grade polymers that can be fully absorbed by the human body and can induce the regeneration of autologous collagen. Through STAT technology, it is divided into two dosage forms, S and M, and the effects can last for 1 and 2 years respectively. Suitable for large-area facial filling and lifting and shaping. All formulations contain an anesthetic to reduce discomfort during injection.
compare_notes: 洢蓮絲 Ellanse 是一種 膠原蛋白增生 技術，與其他療程相比，其主要特點在於效果、適應症或施作方式的差異。
compare_notes_en: The main feature of this is the difference between the effect, the adaptation, or the manner of the application of the glycoprotein growth technique, compared to other treatments.

text: 注射後隨著膠原蛋白的自然增生，效果逐漸顯現並可持續較長時間，逐步填補凹陷，改善皺紋，使皮膚恢復彈性和光澤。通常在每次療程完成後的4-6週內看到顯著改善。
description_auto: AestheFill®艾麗斯是一種新型的聚“雙旋”乳酸（PDLLA），能促進膠原蛋白及彈性纖維的生長，有效改善鼻唇溝、皺紋及面部整體問題，是一種自然的膠原蛋白增生劑。
name: 艾麗斯 AestheFill
description: AestheFillR艾麗斯是新型態聚「雙旋」乳酸，一次完整的療程通常分為3次進行，每次間隔4-6週，效果可持續較長時間。適用於鼻唇溝、深淺皺紋及面部整體問題，有效改善肌膚質量和外觀。能刺激自體膠原蛋白增生，效果可長效維持至少18-24個月，皮膚自然柔軟，青春再現，自然回溯年輕。通過刺激自身膠原蛋白的增生，達到自然、漸進的效果，不會突然改變面部輪廓。
description_en: AestheFillR is a new type of poly "double-spin" lactic acid. A complete course of treatment is usually divided into 3 times, with an interval of 4-6 weeks between each time, and the effect can last for a longer time. Suitable for nasolabial folds, deep and shallow wrinkles and overall facial problems, effectively improving skin quality and appearance. It can stimulate the proliferation of autologous collagen, and the effect can be maintained for at least 18-24 months, making the skin naturally soft, youthful, and naturally returning to youth. By stimulating the proliferation of your own collagen, a natural, gradual effect is achieved without abruptly changing the facial contours.
compare_notes: 艾麗斯 AestheFill 是一種 膠原蛋白增生 技術，與其他療程相比，其主要特點在於效果、適應症或施作方式的差異。
compare_notes_en: Alice AestheFill is a kind of pyroglobin growth technique whose main feature is the difference between the effect, the adaptation or the manner in which it is applied, as compared to other treatments.

description_auto: AestheFill®艾麗斯是一種新型的聚“雙旋”乳酸（PDLLA），能促進膠原蛋白及彈性纖維的生長，有效改善鼻唇溝、皺紋及面部整體問題，是一種自然的膠原蛋白增生劑。
name: 艾麗斯 AestheFill
description: AestheFillR艾麗斯是新型態聚「雙旋」乳酸，一次完整的療程通常分為3次進行，每次間隔4-6週，效果可持續較長時間。適用於鼻唇溝、深淺皺紋及面部整體問題，有效改善肌膚質量和外觀。能刺激自體膠原蛋白增生，效果可長效維持至少18-24個月，皮膚自然柔軟，青春再現，自然回溯年輕。通過刺激自身膠原蛋白的增生，達到自然、漸進的效果，不會突然改變面部輪廓。
description_en: AestheFillR is a new type of poly "double-spin" lactic acid. A complete course of treatment is usually divided into 3 times, with an interval of 4-6 weeks between each time, and the effect can last for a longer time. Suitable for nasolabial folds, deep and shallow wrinkles and overall facial problems, effectively improving skin quality and appearance. It can stimulate the proliferation of autologous collagen, and the effect can be maintained for at least 18-24 months, making the skin naturally soft, youthful, and naturally returning to youth. By stimulating the proliferation of your own collagen, a natural, gradual effect is achieved without abruptly changing the facial contours.

text: 推薦兩大熱門體態雕塑療程：冷凍減脂與CMSlim增肌減脂。透過非侵入性科技協助您有效管理脂肪與肌肉比例，邁向緊實線條與勻稱體態。
description_auto: 提供CMSlim增肌減脂機器，透過非侵入式的方式，讓使用者在短短數週內，看到顯著的身材變化。並搭配Cooltech Define 冷凍減脂，利用脂肪細胞對低溫的敏感性，通過冷凍技術將脂肪細胞結晶化並啟動自然凋亡程序，最終被身體代謝排出。
name: 增肌減脂 CMSlim
description: CMSlim 為一款非侵入式高能量聚焦電磁鍛鍊設備，可透過深層刺激肌肉運動，同時輔助改善脂肪分布與線條雕塑。產品優勢:1.真空吸引：治療區域的皮膚和脂肪被真空吸引至冷凍裝置中2.冷凍技術：裝置內部提供持續的低溫，使脂肪細胞結晶化3.脂肪凋亡：經過凍結後的脂肪細胞會啟動自然凋亡程序4.代謝排出：經過約3個月，脂肪細胞會被身體自然代謝排出達到減脂效果5.提高療程效果：增肌減脂治療後使用360度按摩手握把進行按摩，恢復血液循環 ，每次治療僅需30分鐘，且不需要任何恢復時間。
description_en: CMSlim is a non-invasive high-energy focused electromagnetic training device that can deeply stimulate muscle movement while helping to improve fat distribution and line sculpture. Product advantages: 1. Vacuum suction: The skin and fat in the treatment area are vacuum-sucked into the freezing device. 2. Cryogenic technology: The device provides continuous low temperature to crystallize fat cells. 3. Fat apoptosis: The frozen fat cells will start the natural apoptosis process. 4. Metabolic excretion: After about 3 months, the fat cells will be naturally metabolized and excreted by the body to achieve a fat-reducing effect. 5. Improve the effect of the treatment: After the muscle-building and fat-reducing treatment, use the 360-degree massage hand grip to massage and restore blood circulation. Each treatment takes only 30 minutes and does not require any recovery time.
compare_notes: 增肌減脂 CMSlim 是一種 體態雕塑 技術，與其他療程相比，其主要特點在於效果、適應症或施作方式的差異。
compare_notes_en: CMSlim is a body sculpture technique whose main feature is the difference in effect, adaptation or mode of application compared to other treatments.

description_auto: 冷凍減脂（CoolSculpting® Elite）是美國 FDA 認可的非侵入式體雕療程，透過專利冷卻技術精準鎖定脂肪細胞。全新 Elite 新機型升級為雙凍力設計，搭配 C 型雕塑杯，不僅提高治療效率達 18%，更減少高達74%的療程不適感，讓您在舒適環境下輕鬆擁有理想曲線。
name: 冷凍減脂 coolsculpting
description: 冷凍減脂（CoolSculptingR Elite）是美國 FDA 認可的非侵入式體態雕塑療程，透過專利冷卻技術精準鎖定脂肪細胞。冷凍減脂原理STEP.1：運?負壓吸引多餘的脂肪，並持續的給予低溫。STEP.2：脂肪細胞受到低溫冷凍的作?，開始結晶化。STEP.3：療程結束後，脂肪細胞因結晶化?開始凋零死亡，在未來數週?數?期間，會自然代謝出體外。STEP.4：一到三個?後，剩餘脂肪細胞會重新排列，脂肪層逐漸變薄。不?汗流滿?、狼狽不堪的瘋狂運動，酷塑coolsculptingR Elite優雅找回曲線狠簡單
description_en: CoolSculptingR Elite is a non-invasive body sculpting treatment approved by the US FDA that uses patented cooling technology to precisely target fat cells. Principle of cryolipolysis STEP.1: Use negative pressure to attract excess fat and continuously provide low temperature. STEP.2: Fat cells are frozen at low temperatures and begin to crystallize. STEP.3: After the treatment, the fat cells begin to wither and die due to crystallization, and will be naturally metabolized out of the body in the next few weeks to months. STEP.4: After one to three months, the remaining fat cells will be rearranged and the fat layer will gradually become thinner. No need to sweat and do crazy exercises, coolsculptingR Elite can help you get your curves back elegantly and easily

description_en: CoolSculptingR Elite is a non-invasive body sculpting treatment approved by the US FDA that uses patented cooling technology to precisely target fat cells. Principle of cryolipolysis STEP.1: Use negative pressure to attract excess fat and continuously provide low temperature. STEP.2: Fat cells are frozen at low temperatures and begin to crystallize. STEP.3: After the treatment, the fat cells begin to wither and die due to crystallization, and will be naturally metabolized out of the body in the next few weeks to months. STEP.4: After one to three months, the remaining fat cells will be rearranged and the fat layer will gradually become thinner. No need to sweat and do crazy exercises, coolsculptingR Elite can help you get your curves back elegantly and easily
compare_notes: 冷凍減脂 coolsculpting 是一種 體態雕塑 技術，與其他療程相比，其主要特點在於效果、適應症或施作方式的差異。
compare_notes_en: The cooling off of fat is a body sculpture technique whose main feature is the difference in effect, adaptation or mode of application compared to other treatments.

name: 客製化減重
description: 想瘦卻怎麼都瘦不下來，體重超標BMI偏高、外食族、工作壓力大三餐不正常、體態目標難以達成停滯期者，來這裡就對了!減重門診四部驟:Step1:門診諮詢>Step2>填寫問券(了解日常客製化調整)>Step3>測量Inbody精準數據對症下藥>Step4>醫師問診>提供完整評估與規劃。完整療程通常為期 3 至 6 個月，確保達成並穩定維持理想體重。
description_en: If you want to lose weight but can't, are overweight and have a high BMI, eat out, have work pressure and irregular meals, or are in a stagnation period where your body shape goals are difficult to achieve, then come here! The weight loss clinic has four steps: Step 1: Clinic consultation > Step 2 > Fill out the questionnaire (to understand daily customized adjustments) > Step 3 > Measure Inbody's accurate data and prescribe the right medicine > Step 4 > Consult with the doctor > Provide a complete assessment and plan. A full course of treatment usually lasts 3 to 6 months to ensure ideal weight is achieved and maintained.
compare_notes: 客製化減重 是一種 體態雕塑 技術，與其他療程相比，其主要特點在於效果、適應症或施作方式的差異。
compare_notes_en: Personalized weight reduction is a form of sculpture technology whose main speciality is the difference in effect, adaptation or the way in which it is performed, compared to other treatments.

text: 靜脈雷射（Intravenous Laser Irradiation of Blood, ILIB），又稱生化雷射、雷射光纖淨血，是一種透過低能量雷射照射靜脈血液的療法，能改善血液循環、增強免疫力、促進細胞修復。
description_auto: 靜脈雷射（Intravenous Laser Irradiation of Blood, ILIB），又稱生化雷射、雷射光纖淨血，是一種透過低能量雷射照射靜脈血液的療法，能改善血液循環、增強免疫力、促進細胞修復
name: 靜脈雷射 ILIB
alias: 改善血液循環、增強免疫力、促進細胞修復、排毒
description: 靜脈雷射（Intravenous Laser Irradiation of Blood, ILIB），又稱生化雷射、雷射光纖淨血，是一種透過低能量雷射照射靜脈血液的療法，能改善血液循環、增強免疫力、促進細胞修復。每次療程約 60 分鐘，連續 10 次可完整體驗效果。靜脈雷射無需藥物、無恢復期、無不適感，療程結束後可立即恢復日常生活。減少慢性疾病用藥：高血壓、高血脂、糖尿病、高膽固醇，細胞修復＆機能活化：促進代謝＆排毒：調節免疫＆對抗發炎：慢性病復健＆日常調理：神經痛、中風後復健、睡眠障礙等
description_en: Intravenous Laser Irradiation of Blood (ILIB), also known as biochemical laser and laser fiber blood purification, is a therapy that uses low-energy lasers to irradiate venous blood. It can improve blood circulation, enhance immunity, and promote cell repair. Each treatment lasts approximately 60 minutes, and you can experience the full effects by doing 10 consecutive treatments. Intravenous laser treatment requires no medication, no downtime, and no discomfort, and you can return to your daily life immediately after the treatment. Reduce medication for chronic diseases: high blood pressure, high blood lipids, diabetes, high cholesterol, cell repair & functional activation: promote metabolism & detoxification: regulate immunity & fight inflammation: chronic disease rehabilitation & daily conditioning: neuralgia, post-stroke rehabilitation, sleep disorders, etc.
compare_notes: 靜脈雷射 ILIB 是一種 預防醫學 技術，與其他療程相比，其主要特點在於效果、適應症或施作方式的差異。
compare_notes_en: ILIB is a preventive medical technique whose main feature is the difference in effect, adaptation or the way it is performed, compared to other treatments.

description_auto: 靜脈雷射（Intravenous Laser Irradiation of Blood, ILIB），又稱生化雷射、雷射光纖淨血，是一種透過低能量雷射照射靜脈血液的療法，能改善血液循環、增強免疫力、促進細胞修復
name: 靜脈雷射 ILIB
alias: 改善血液循環、增強免疫力、促進細胞修復、排毒
description: 靜脈雷射（Intravenous Laser Irradiation of Blood, ILIB），又稱生化雷射、雷射光纖淨血，是一種透過低能量雷射照射靜脈血液的療法，能改善血液循環、增強免疫力、促進細胞修復。每次療程約 60 分鐘，連續 10 次可完整體驗效果。靜脈雷射無需藥物、無恢復期、無不適感，療程結束後可立即恢復日常生活。減少慢性疾病用藥：高血壓、高血脂、糖尿病、高膽固醇，細胞修復＆機能活化：促進代謝＆排毒：調節免疫＆對抗發炎：慢性病復健＆日常調理：神經痛、中風後復健、睡眠障礙等
description_en: Intravenous Laser Irradiation of Blood (ILIB), also known as biochemical laser and laser fiber blood purification, is a therapy that uses low-energy lasers to irradiate venous blood. It can improve blood circulation, enhance immunity, and promote cell repair. Each treatment lasts approximately 60 minutes, and you can experience the full effects by doing 10 consecutive treatments. Intravenous laser treatment requires no medication, no downtime, and no discomfort, and you can return to your daily life immediately after the treatment. Reduce medication for chronic diseases: high blood pressure, high blood lipids, diabetes, high cholesterol, cell repair & functional activation: promote metabolism & detoxification: regulate immunity & fight inflammation: chronic disease rehabilitation & daily conditioning: neuralgia, post-stroke rehabilitation, sleep disorders, etc.
compare_notes: 靜脈雷射 ILIB 是一種 預防醫學 技術，與其他療程相比，其主要特點在於效果、適應症或施作方式的差異。
compare_notes_en: ILIB is a preventive medical technique whose main feature is the difference in effect, adaptation or the way it is performed, compared to other treatments.

text: 首頁»異業合作»芮恩美學診所攜手屋馬餐飲集團異業聯盟
name: 屋馬餐飲集團
description: <目前活動已截止>只要在屋馬集團單桌單筆消費滿3000元，即贈送芮恩美學診所3000元現金禮券！優惠至113/10/31為止 可折抵芮恩美學診所的所有品項，包括優惠活動。且芮恩診所距離屋馬文心店僅290公尺，步行僅需4分鐘，非常便利！
description_en: As long as it is 3000 dollars in a single desk in the Hamma group, it will be 3,000 dollars in cash vouchers for the Rennes School of Medicine! A discount of 113/10/31 will cover all the items of the Rennes Clinic, including its activities. And the Rennes Clinic is only 290 meters away from the Marvin Heart House, and it will take only four minutes to walk.
compare_notes: 屋馬餐飲集團 是一種 異業合作 技術，與其他療程相比，其主要特點在於效果、適應症或施作方式的差異。
compare_notes_en: The House Horse Catering Group is an unprofessional cooperative technique whose main feature is the difference between the effects, the adaptations or the manner in which they are applied, as compared to other treatments.

description: <目前活動已截止>只要在屋馬集團單桌單筆消費滿3000元，即贈送芮恩美學診所3000元現金禮券！優惠至113/10/31為止 可折抵芮恩美學診所的所有品項，包括優惠活動。且芮恩診所距離屋馬文心店僅290公尺，步行僅需4分鐘，非常便利！
description_en: As long as it is 3000 dollars in a single desk in the Hamma group, it will be 3,000 dollars in cash vouchers for the Rennes School of Medicine! A discount of 113/10/31 will cover all the items of the Rennes Clinic, including its activities. And the Rennes Clinic is only 290 meters away from the Marvin Heart House, and it will take only four minutes to walk.
compare_notes: 屋馬餐飲集團 是一種 異業合作 技術，與其他療程相比，其主要特點在於效果、適應症或施作方式的差異。
compare_notes_en: The House Horse Catering Group is an unprofessional cooperative technique whose main feature is the difference between the effects, the adaptations or the manner in which they are applied, as compared to other treatments.

text: 在追求美麗與品質的道路上，女生們最關注的兩大議題無疑是「醫美」與「精品」。抓準女生的需求，芮恩美學診所攜手老佛
